summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Harbor Avenue Southwest from Bronson Way to the southerly line of Lot 51, Block 71, 3rd Plat of West Seattle Land and Improvement Company, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 9215 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
